# Pull Request Template

## Summary
Describe the purpose of this pull request. What problem does it solve or what feature does it add?

## Related Issues
Link any related issues or discussions.

- Fixes #
- Related to #

## What’s Changed
Provide a clear, concise list of changes.

- Added…
- Updated…
- Removed…
- Refactored…

## How to Test
Explain how reviewers can verify your changes.

- Steps to reproduce or validate
- Commands to run
- Any relevant test data

## ✔️ Checklist
Please confirm the following before requesting review:

- [ ] My code builds successfully
- [ ] I added or updated tests where appropriate
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] I updated documentation (README, docs/, XML comments) if needed
- [ ] I followed the project’s coding standards and conventions
- [ ] I linked related issues

## Screenshots (Optional)
If your change affects UI, logs, or output, include screenshots or examples.

## Additional Notes
Add any extra context, questions for reviewers, or follow‑up items.
